item.title: Loads of funcs Mr. Freeweed
item.dc:creator: @mr_freeweed mr. freeweed
item.description:
@mr_freeweed wrote:

Edit: Releasing another load of funcs soon!!

Hello Im not sure what to say but I hope that everyone likes these. I was mainly looking into how Tpoints work for the object finders. when I started modifying code. I successfully made a colorfinder and object finder that searches from the right so it was a success. Here is the result

Oh and
Have Fun Always!!!

[font=Verdana]
Download Below To many to fit[/font]

[code]{.include SRL/SRL.scar}

{Compiled, Modified, and Created by: Mr. Freeweed}
{Made for SRL Members}

{If you need to contact me with ideas, Rants,
or provide some general writing expertise Contact me at
mr.freeweed@hotmail.com - Email or Msn - mr.freeweed@hotmail.com

{While learning how to write in pascal I chopped, Modded, Reviewed tons of code, mainly srl.
Expect alot more Original code now that I know most of the language structure}
